reviewText: Brainwrap is work of art for many people. We have sold out theaters and entertained audiences from coast to coast from living to the living room. I loved making this movie and being apart of a dream that so many people share! I am so very proud of this project...I love the story, characters, music, cinematography, editing, and everything in between. Support Independent Film buy Brainwrap!

this is one of the most delightfully twisted films that has come along in a while. a perfect blend of comedy and the macabre blended together in one work of absolute genius.  i recommend this film to anyone who enjoys well made independent cinema.
